data.title: The Price is Right
data.meta_description: America's #1 television studio audience company and the official source for free tickets to your favorite shows.
data.text:
Price is Right is back with studio audiences. Now's your chance to be a part of television's longest-running game show, featuring host Drew Carey, where audience members try to win cash and prizes. Check this off your bucket list! Make sure to sign up now and we will notify you as soon as we release tickets.

Each day has 2 to 3 shows per day.

Please select only one show per day to attend.

Note-If you would like to attend more than one show per day, please inquire at check-in show availability.

HAVE QUESTIONS? If you have questions about attending the TV show in Los Angeles, please email your questions to tickets@ocatv.com. If you have questions about the Price is Right Play at Home Game, please call 1-800-700-6525. If you have questions about the Price is Right LIVE show traveling to a city near you, please visit http://priceisrightlive.com.

Tickets are generally released about a month in advance.

MINIMUM AGE TO ATTEND IS 18

PLEASE JOIN US ON FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM @OnCameraAudiences and get in the spirit with your own The Price is Right merch from Merch by Amazon Price is Right Store as merch will not be available for purchase at the studio.
